name: Sparky (Steven Leavengood)
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 Entry - https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/sparky-3

~Story~ Sparky is a faithful robot companion who would do anything for his robot friend Chuck. After being robbed of his parts one day, Chuck asks Sparky to help retrieve his parts. Will you fight the Robot hoard to save your master, find the parts, or simply run away? ~Goals and Objectives~ Find enemy robots to beat them up for scrap. Defeat the bosses and gather extra parts. Or...find the secret ending ;) ~Controls~ WASD - Movement Left Click - Attack Enter - Returns you to the map if you fall off Right Click - Take Damage, meant for testing but feel free!
